title: Skin Boost, something needs to be done.
body: There needs to be some kind of fix for the skin boost that gives a 200 ip boost and unlocks skins. I like to do this for teams i play with but it kind of sucks when you purchase it and someone bails and you lose the rp. Can there be a way to make it so when we buy it that if someone bails that the rp is not used.

Hey everyone,

Zwill reached out to me and I wanted to clear up any confusion.

The RP for ARAM Skin Boosts are only removed from your account after a game of ARAM has been successfully completed (in Victory/Defeat).  If there was a dodge in Champ Select, or if the game crashed for everyone and never ended, your RP will not be removed.  You can learn more about this in our [FAQ Article.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204713760-ARAM-Skin-Boosts-FAQ#h2q1)

More specifically, I double-checked smeagledorf's account to verify this, and confirmed that every recent deduction of RP, has an accompanied completed game of ARAM recorded.

Let me know if anyone has any further concerns! :)

By no means do I think you are a liar.  If there is an instance where this happened, I want to correct this immediately as that is not ok.  I checked your games within the last 48 hours, and was not able to find an instance of this happening.

If it does, feel free to reply back with this specific example and I will be more than happy to look into it further!
